summary: Project involves a team section with member photos. User wants team member images redesigned with glassmorphic theme, suitable sizing, and image enhancement.
architectural_notes: Team section contains member photos that use glassmorphic UI theme

existing_features.title: Redesign both team member profile images in TeamMembersPage.tsx to use a glassmorphic frame: apply a frosted-glass card effect (backdrop-blur, semi-transparent background, subtle border with white/light opacity) around each member's photo, ensuring the image is displayed at a consistent and suitable size (e.g., 200Ã—200px or similar square dimensions) with rounded corners and a soft glowing border to match the existing dark futuristic glassmorphism theme.

Enhance both team member profile images visually: apply CSS-level enhancements such as brightness boost, slight contrast increase, and a subtle inner glow or drop-shadow to make the photos appear more vibrant and polished within the glassmorphic frames.

new_feature_requests.summary: Redesign team member images with glassmorphic theme, suitable sizing, and image enhancement
